trans-unit.source: Represents an empty key identifier clause.

This class is used when an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedData>" name="<EncryptedData>" href=""></xref> or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Signature>" name="<Signature>" href=""></xref> element does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element, which is used to describe the key required to decrypt the data or check the signature.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EmptySecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class.
This constructor assumes that the user knows how to resolve the key required without any context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EmptySecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class with the specified context.
Used to provide a hint when there is a need resolve an empty clause to a particular key.

In the case of SAML11 and SAML2 tokens that have signatures without a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element, this property will contain the assertion that is currently being processed.
Gets an object that is used to provide a hint when there is a need to resolve to a particular key.
In the case of SAML11 and SAML2 tokens that have signatures without a `<KeyInfo>` element, this property will contain the assertion that is currently being processed.
An object that provides a hint when there is a need to resolve to a particular key.
